settings.text: Project 1 [ P1 ] is the collaboration limited-edition frame created by Oscar Magnuson and the 100 year old Japanese eyewear company KameManNen (KMN X OM). Oscar Magnuson has designed a frame using signature KMN elements, bringing lightweight titanium to the company for the first time. The frame includes bio-acetate which is 100% recyclable and biodegradable. Each KMN X OM frame is first crafted in Japan, then finished in our factory in Italy. This collaboration celebrates the best of Scandinavian and Japanese design with a focus on function and natural materials: minimal expression, maximum statement.Â
